title: When are ranked rewards being distributed?
body: Is there a specific date yet?

replies.body: There isn't a specific date for when everyone will have their rewards, but they *are* going out over the course of November so it might take a couple days. Feel free to hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you're concerned after a week or so and still don't see them!
